parameters.name: ActionParams
parameters.description: The action-related parameters. Such parameters can be added based on your business requirements. The ActionParams parameter value varies based on the taskAction parameter value.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the region ID.

parameters.name: StepName
parameters.description: The name of the step visible to the user.

parameters.name: TaskAction
parameters.description: The name of the action to perform. Specify the value of this parameter as the action name corresponding to the current state of the task. The action name can be obtained from the actionInfo parameter returned by the [DescribeHistoryTasks](~~2639186~~) operation.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The task ID. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,). You can specify up to 10 task IDs.
